info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 12 at 9:20AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi TX
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas...
Garcitas Creek Near Inez affecting Victoria County.
For the Garcitas Creek...including Inez...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Garcitas Creek near Inez.
* WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Moderate flooding occurs, causing significant crop damage. Pastureland floods and isolates livestock in cut off areas. Secondary roads and low bridges are flooded.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 21.4 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
